title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4002.13 - Ownership affidavit required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4002.13 - Ownership affidavit required

State Regulations

An owner to be eligible for a license may be required
to submit an affidavit as to his or her ownership or lease of all horses in his
or her possession in such form as the commission may require. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4002.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
